item.title: Third Competition Winner
item.description: The third week of the competition is over and we can now announce the winner of a Hairy Baby t-shirt. []2 Laurence Veale from Dublin in Ireland wins with his sharp Twitter review of the western “3.10 to Yuma”. As with all the winners, it looks like Lar’s Google juice is strong. There is only one week left in this first phase of our competition, so get reviewing and you could win a tee like this:
